io.spine.server.event.model

Interface ReactorClass

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregateClass, AggregatePartClass, ProcessManagerClass, ReactorClassDelegate

    public interface ReactorClass
    Provides message handling information on a class that reacts on messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getEventReactions()
      Obtains a set of event classes to which this class reacts.
      java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getExternalEventReactions()
      Obtains a set of external events to which this class reacts.
      java.util.Set<io.spine.core.RejectionClass> getExternalRejectionReactions()
      Obtains a set of external rejections to which this class reacts.
      EventReactorMethod getReactor(io.spine.core.EventClass eventClass)
      Obtains the method that reacts on the passed event class.
      RejectionReactorMethod getReactor(io.spine.core.RejectionClass rejCls, io.spine.core.CommandClass cmdCls)
      Obtains the method that reacts on the passed projection class.
      java.util.Set<io.spine.core.RejectionClass> getRejectionReactions()
      Obtains a set of rejection classes to which this class reacts.

    • Method Detail

      • getEventReactions

        java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getEventReactions()
        Obtains a set of event classes to which this class reacts.

        The returned set contains only event classes of the BoundedContext to which the class belongs.

        For reactions on external events, please see getExternalEventReactions().

      • getExternalEventReactions

        java.util.Set<io.spine.core.EventClass> getExternalEventReactions()
        Obtains a set of external events to which this class reacts.

        External events are those that are delivered to the BoundedContext to which this class belongs from outside.

        For reactions on domestic events, please see getEventReactions().

      • getRejectionReactions

        java.util.Set<io.spine.core.RejectionClass> getRejectionReactions()
        Obtains a set of rejection classes to which this class reacts.

        The returned set contains only rejection classes of the BoundedContext to which the class belongs.

        For reactions on external rejections, please see getExternalRejectionReactions().

      • getExternalRejectionReactions

        java.util.Set<io.spine.core.RejectionClass> getExternalRejectionReactions()
        Obtains a set of external rejections to which this class reacts.

        External rejections are those that are delivered to the BoundedContext to which this class belongs from outside.

        For reactions on domestic rejections, please see getRejectionReactions().

      • getReactor

        EventReactorMethod getReactor(io.spine.core.EventClass eventClass)
        Obtains the method that reacts on the passed event class.

      • getReactor

        RejectionReactorMethod getReactor(io.spine.core.RejectionClass rejCls,
                                  io.spine.core.CommandClass cmdCls)
        Obtains the method that reacts on the passed projection class.
